tabs.ariaLabel: Two separate tabs: one for the template e-service details and another for using tenants.

bottomActions.navigateTemplateVersions: Navigate to another e-service template version

technicalInformations.title: E-service technical specifications
technicalInformations.description: In this section you can check the specifications of the e-service and make changes.

usefulLinks.title: Useful links
usefulLinks.implementAndManageEServiceTemplate: How do I implement and manage an e-service template?
usefulLinks.updateEserviceInstance: How can I update an e-service instance?

updateEServiceTemplateNameDrawer.title: Edit template e-service name
updateEServiceTemplateNameDrawer.subtitle: From this panel you can update the name of the template e-service. The changes made will take effect immediately

validation.sameValue: The template e-service name must be different from the current one

updateEServiceTemplateAudienceDrawer.title: Edit the target audience
updateEServiceTemplateAudienceDrawer.subtitle: From this panel, you can update the target audience of the template. The changes made will take effect immediately

validation.sameValue: The template target audience  must be different from the current one

updateEServiceTemplateDescriptionDrawer.title: Edit the template e-service description
updateEServiceTemplateDescriptionDrawer.subtitle: From this panel, you can update the description of the template. The changes made will take effect immediately.

validation.sameValue: The template e-service description must be different from the current one

updateEServiceTemplateThresholdsDrawer.subtitle: From this panel, you can update the quotas of the template eservice. The changes made will take effect immediately

updateDocumentationDrawer.title: Edit documentation
updateDocumentationDrawer.subtitle: Now you can edit, download and delete documents attached to the e-service template.
updateDocumentationDrawer.interfaceInfoTooltip: The “API Specification” file is not editable. To update it, create a new version.

versionSelectorDrawer.title: Navigate to another  e-service template version
versionSelectorDrawer.label: Select version

noMultiDataLabel: You have not yet created e-service templates.

step1.detailsDescription: The information in this section will not be modifiable by the implementers of the instances.

intendedTargetField.label: Who is the template intended for?

eserviceDescriptionField.label: What does this e-service allow you to do?

eserviceTemplateTechnologyField.label: What technology is your API built with?

eserviceTemplateModeField.label: Does the e-service deliver or receive data?

isSignalHubEnabled.label: I suggest the implementer to report any data changes on Signal Hub.

infoLabel.after: to generate notifications related to data changes regarding the e-service.

stepPurpose.firstVersionOnlyEditableInfoAlert: The contents of this step will no longer be editable after the publication of the first version of the e-service

purposeTableSection.title: Purpose
purposeTableSection.description: Indicate the use cases for which you intend to collect data. For each purpose you will need to complete a risk analysis.
purposeTableSection.noSelectedPurposesTooltip: You must indicate at least one purpose to continue

thresholdsSwitch.label: Suggest custom API threshold values to the implementer

validation.min: This value cannot be below the threshold set for the API calls/day for each subscriber

agreementApprovalPolicySection.label: Suggest to the implementer the manual activation of the received fruition requests.

tenantKindDialog.title: Indicate who will be able to use the following risk analysis.
tenantKindDialog.description: Indicate for whom the following risk analysis is filled.

tenantKind.labelPA: Public administration (Art. 2, comma 2, letter “a” of Codice dell’Amministrazione Digitale)
tenantKind.labelNotPA: Operators of public services, publicly controlled companies (Art. 2, comma 2, letters “b” e “c”) or Private

step3.attributesDescription: Please point out all the certified, verified and declared attributes that the provider must have in order to create an agreement for the e-service

createAttributeDrawer.subtitle: Una volta creato, troverai l’attributo nella lista tra quelli disponibili per essere aggiunti ad un e-service

interface.title: Interface
interface.alert: You can upload a file without contact data, terms and conditions, and server URLs, as these will be filled in by the implementer in the next phase.

description.rest: Upload a draft of the OpenAPI specification that describes the API.
description.soap: Upload a draft of the WSDL specification that describes the API

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Upload all the technical documentation useful for the implementation of an integration with this e-service.

isSignalHubEnabled.label: Is it suggested to use the data update system (Signal Hub)?

notPublishableTooltip.label: One or more required fields have not been filled out. Complete the draft, please.
